issue.title: [Python][Docs] PyArrow Architecture page outdated after moving pyarrow C++ code
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17831](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17831). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This section is no longer up to date: https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/python/getting_involved.html#pyarrow-architecture

(it still mentions cpp/src/arrow/python)

cc `[~alenka]`

comments.body:
